variable.name: is-temporary
variable.label: Temporary?
variable.abstract: Is this Export part of a Reorg ? If yes it is Temporary
variable.description: TEMPORARY specifies that the catalog is not to be deleted. The catalog is marked "temporary" to indicate that another copy exists and that the original copy can be replaced. This is a required parameter when exporting a catalog that cannot be exported with the PERMANENT parameter
